metadata.title: CVE-2015-9541 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Qt through 5.14 allows an exponential XML entity expansion attack via a crafted SVG document that is mishandled in QXmlStreamReader, a related issue to CVE-2003-1564.

criterions.comment: pyside2 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.12.5+dfsg-9build1').
